00025 // be sure that this file not accessed directly
00026 if (basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) == basename(__FILE__)) {
00027     die();
00028 }
00029 
00030 // check session
00031 $unauthorized = !isset($_SESSION['uid']) && !isset($_SESSION['uname']) && !isset($_SESSION['realname']);
00032 if ($unauthorized) {
00033     $msg = '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00034     $msg .= 'alert(\''.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'\');'."\n";
00035     $msg .= 'location.href = \''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'index.php?p=login\';'."\n";
00036     $msg .= '</script>'."\n";
00037     simbio_security::destroySessionCookie($msg, SENAYAN_SESSION_COOKIES_NAME, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin', true);
00038 }
00039 
00040 // checking session checksum
00041 $unauthorized = $_SESSION['checksum'] != md5($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'].SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin');
00042 if ($unauthorized) {
00043     $msg = '<div style="padding: 5px; border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000;">';
00044     $msg .= __('You are not authorized to view this section');
00045     $msg .= '</div>'."\n";
00046     simbio_security::destroySessionCookie($msg, SENAYAN_SESSION_COOKIES_NAME, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin', true);
00047 }
00048 
00049 // check for session timeout
00050 $curr_timestamp = time();
00051 $timeout = ($curr_timestamp-$_SESSION['logintime']) >= $sysconf['session_timeout'];
00052 if ($timeout) {
00053     $msg = '<div style="padding: 5px; border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000;">';
00054     $msg .= __('Your Login Session has already timeout!').' <a href="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'index.php?p=login">Re-Login</a>';
00055     $msg .= '</div>'."\n";
00056     simbio_security::destroySessionCookie($msg, SENAYAN_SESSION_COOKIES_NAME, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin', true);
00057 } else {
00058     // renew session logintime
00059     $_SESSION['logintime'] = time();
00060 }
00061 ?>
